name: Number of Datasets
description: Number number of datasets on CKAN by date. It doesn't include private datasets.

name: Number of Organizations
description: Total number of organiations on CKAN by date.

name: Number of Registered Users
description: Total number of registered users on CKAN by date.

name: Number of Datasets Created
description: Total number of datasets created on CKAN by date.

name: Number of Datasets Deleted
description: Total number of datasets deleted on CKAN by date.

name: Number of Datasets Edited
description: Total number of datasets edited on CKAN by date.

name: Number of Unique Visitors
description: Number of unique visitors to the website by period.

name: Total Number of Events
description: Total events (share, preview, download) by period.

name: Number of Downloads
description: Total number of downloads of resources by period.

name: Number of Previews
description: Total number of previews of resources by period.

name: Number of Shares
description: Total number of shares of resources by period.

name: Number of Dataset Shares
description: Total number of dataset shares by period.

name: Average Session Duration
description: Average session duration by period.

name: Total Unique Events
description: Total number of unique events (share, preview, download) by period.

name: Number of Unique Downloads
description: Total number of unique downloads of resources by period.

name: Number of Unique Previews
description: Total number of unique previews of resources by period.

name: Number of Unique Shares
description: Total number of unique shares of resources by period.

name: Bounce Rate
description: Bounce rate (define!).

name: Number of Twitter Followers
description: Number of twitter accounts following @humdata.

name: Number of Twitter Following
description: Number of twitter accounts being followed by @humdata.
